name: obsidian-sync-wasm
description: An optimized sync plugin for Obsidian

scripts.dev: npm run wasm && concurrently -n wasm,ts -c cyan,green "npm run dev:wasm" "npm run dev:ts"
scripts.build: npm run wasm && tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:rust
scripts.build:install: npm run build && npm run install:test-vaults
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json

author: Taylor Dickson
